title: BUSINESS SEGMENT
description: BUSINESS SEGMENTs are a further segmentation of the BUSINESS UNIT. They are needed because BUSINESS UNITs themselves are too large to be steered without having data on deeper levels. The BUSINESS SEGMENTs are BIâ€™s focus areas for which separate data is needed to be able to decide which of these shall be kept/enlarged/discontinued.

name.title: name
name.description:
The term is the human readable unique name typically used in drop down menus of applications. 
In cases when the complete name is too long, then a meaningful abbreviation is created for the term.
English is the leading Language.

English is the leading Language.

longDescription.description:
